original: 沛國龍亢人。以清正聞名，無懼宦官勢大，曾平定滎陽黃巾。後與何進共謀誅除宦官，但因計畫先一步被宦官察覺而失敗。
text: Pei Guo Long Kang Ren. Known for being upright and fearless of eunuchs, he once put down the Xingyang Yellow Turban. Later, he and He Jin conspired to eliminate the eunuch, but the plan was first detected by the eunuch and failed.
